column5: I need some help here. How come when I enter salmon jigs into the search engine I get everything from how you spent your christmas vacation to why I quit smoking. Who cares I want info on jigs. I know there is lots of people here who make jigs and I am looking to purchase some. I would rather buy jigs that are made by fisherman/woman that use them themselves because they use the proper components etc. I ordered some from B.C. and want to compare the difference. Thanks in advance.
I'll make you whatever you need. PM me.
Add a plus sign to every word you want in a search, a minus sign to exclude words.  +salmon +jigs
I know guys jig with a lure called a Bondy Bait for big lakers.
